speaker: Avril Doyle (PPE-DE). -
english: Avril Doyle (PPE-DE). - Madam President, could I have assurances from Commissioner McCreevy that the single set of global accounting standards – with the consequent drive for increased standardisation of procedures – will in no way increase the justification, or even the requirement, for an EU common consolidated corporation tax base?
original: Avril Doyle (PPE-DE). - Madam President, could I have assurances from Commissioner McCreevy that the single set of global accounting standards – with the consequent drive for increased standardisation of procedures – will in no way increase the justification, or even the requirement, for an EU common consolidated corporation tax base?
agenda_item: International Financial Reporting Standards and the governance of the International Accounting Standards Board (debate)
